txt.en:
'Well, my fine [placeholder], it would appear that there is method behind the recent madness of the snow-beasts. The peikko have been stirred up, you see, by the return of the great snow-matron.

'I thought her existence was a bit of a legend, told to us by the Lossoth as a cautionary tale, but it turns out she is quite real. Since she has come back, it is all an honest dwarf can do to make his way through Länsi-ma without having an ice-boulder hurled at his head.

'Do us all a favour, [placeholder]: rid Itä-mâ of this threat! I believe she is within the same cave I told you about before: east and up the hill.'
'It would seem there are more and more reasons to sing your praises, [placeholder]! You have done well by me and mine.'
'What are you doing here when the snow-matron is still living comfortably in that cave? East! Up the hill! Get yourself going.'
Keli has figured out why the snow-beasts have been so aggressive recently and wants you to kill their matron.
The great snow-matron can be found in the cave east and up the hill from Zigilgund.\n\nKeli has asked you to rid Forochel of the great snow-matron who has been stirring up the peikko.
Keli is at Zigilgund, west of the peikko-cave.\n\nYou should return to Keli with news of your victory of the great snow-matron.
